WELCOME TO EFCO FOOD

Producing and Supply of Food & Beverages


EFCO Food has established in the year 2019 and based in Dubai (UAE). We are giving fantastic nature of items like Energy Drinks, Sports Drink, Rice, Dry Fruits & Nuts, and many more. Under the capable guidance of Mr. Ebrahim Khaledi Who has numerous years of experience in this Business. His long experience helps us to face and solve any difficulty or problem.

We give these items at sensible costs and supply at the guaranteed time span. Our business incorporates also in Dubai, USA, UK, GCC Countries, Africa, Iraq and Asian Countries. We are exceedingly refreshing among the clients for the ideal quality items that we offer simply after total testing and affirmation.

We are always welcoming any new business deals and opportunity for marketing our products. If we find scope for growth, then we can appoint distributor for that particular zone. For that you can fill and send our Distributor Form.

About US

How we work

About us

EFCO based in Dubai (UAE) is a famous name in the Global market for its Brand Products. Under the direction of Mr.Ebrahim Khaledi (CEO), who personaly has involvement in daily company affairs. His experience encourages us to tackle and face any issues.

Our Vision

We have a group of professionals who are talented and experienced. Our team is the backbone of our organization as they work nonstop to serve clients with magnificent quality products.
Our group has: Production Manager, Marketing Heads, Administrators, Sales Executives, Quality Inspectors, Packaging Experts, Logisticians

Our Mission

We are on a mission to offer a healthy and sustainable choice in energy drinks, with no compromise on taste, quality and most important of all - experience.

Sales & Marketing

Exports

We export as per client requirment from 1 or more Containers, shipping from our Factory in Poland and Turkey to any part of world.

Distributor

We are open to distributor for our new regions, who can give commitment for Orders and has good potential to supply our goods.

Local UAE Retails and Wholesales

We also supply to Local UAE markets in wholesales to Hypermarkets, Supermarkets, Groceries, Hospitalities, Events & Caterings

WHY CHOOSE US

In EFCO Our energy drinks are developed to make you to feel confident in your ability, fearless on every adventure, and readyto tackle every challenge!

01. Quality

To create a strong customer commitment, we establish and follow the best factory production unit to processes and maintain same ingredients formule by Lab Testing.

02. Prompt Delivery

We employ a high level of leadership fully dedicated to handle and execute all Sales Orders by coordinating with Warehouse Logistics, Customs, Documentation and delivery the shipment cargo by any Land, Sea or Air mode.

03. Customer Services

Our business model is to supply our branded products to Distributor, Merchants, Wholesalers. We also facilate our Customers by giving them rebates in brand advertisements, marketing and promotions.
